Traits.Name: Aerial Evasion
Traits.Content: Discuss can avoid ranged attacks, gaining a +2 bonus to AC against ranged weapon attacks.

Traits.Name: Razor Fins
Traits.Content: Discuss's melee attacks deal an additional 2d6 slashing damage from its razor-sharp fins.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Discuss makes two attacks: one with Finslash and one with Thunder Wave.

Actions.Name: Finslash
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage from its razor-sharp fins.

Actions.Name: Thunder Wave (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Discuss emits a powerful wave of force in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 18 (4d8) thunder damage and be pushed 10 feet away from the Discuss.

Actions.Name: Disorienting Splash (Recharge 6)
Actions.Content: The Discuss creates a 15-foot-radius splash of water around it. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or become blinded until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Soothing Presence (1/Day)
Actions.Content: The Discuss releases a calming aura. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed until the end of the Discuss's next turn, feeling a sense of peace and safety.
